data.title: Office of Undergraduate Admissions
data.text:
Transfer Requirements

Along with the general admission requirements for transfer students, each UC Irvine academic unit has additional requirements, depending on your major of choice.

All major-specific admission requirements must be completed by the end of the spring term prior to the fall quarter of enrollment. Learn which major prerequisites are required and any other criteria you need to meet below.

For more information regarding the AP and IB examination credit policies please refer to the UC Irvine General Catalogue.

School of Biological Sciences

Students who wish to be considered for the following majors should follow the required and recommended course preparation outlined for Biological Sciences and Ecology, Evolutionary Biology, and Biology/Education. The following majors are not available until the student is enrolled at UC Irvine:

Biochemistry and Molecular Biology

Developmental and Cell Biology

Exercise Sciences

Genetics

Human Biology

Microbiology and Immunology

Neurobiology
